title: "Dina Machuve"

<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-md-7">
<br><br>Dina Machuve is a Lecturer and Researcher at the Nelson Mandela African Institution of Science and Technology [(NM-AIST)](https://www.nm-aist.ac.tz){target="_blank"} in Arusha, Tanzania. She holds a PhD in Information and Communication Science and Engineering from NM-AIST in 2016, and a MS in Electrical Engineering from Tennessee Technological University [(TTU)](https://tntech.edu){target="_blank"}, USA in 2008 and BSc Electrical Engineering degree from University of Dar es Salaam [(UDSM)](https://www.udsm.ac.tz){target="_blank"} in 2001. 
<br><br>She co-organizes the Data Science Africa [(DSA)](https://datascienceafrica.org){target="_blank"}, an organization that runs an annual data science and machine learning summer school and workshop in Africa. She is a member of a research group on Mechanism Design for Social Good [(MDSG)](http://md4sg.com/){target="_blank"}. Her research interests are data science, bioinformatics, agriculture informatics on food value chains and STEM education in schools.
